text: Jessica Alba and her husband Cash Warren brought their three children to the Baby2Baby Holiday Party presented by denim brand Frame at Montage Beverly Hills on Sunday. Aside from Christmas, the 37 - year - old Golden Globe nominee is excited to celebrate son Hayes'first birthday on December 31 and the Pair of Thieves sock / underwear designer turns the big 4 - 0 on January 10. The married couple of over a decade - who met on the 2004 set of Fantastic Four - are also parents of seven - year - old daughter Haven and 10 - year - old daughter Honor. Making merry!
